pawns

Class Pawn

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.AbstractButton
            • javax.swing.JButton
              • pawns.Pawn
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.ItemSelectable, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bomb, Captain, Colonel, Empty, Flag, General, Lake, Lieutenant, Major, Marshall, Miner, Scout, Sergeant, Spy

    public abstract class Pawn
extends javax.swing.JButton
    Class that provides methods for the pawns, that contains the 2 color states blue and red and that can fade out the jbutton to make it invisible.
    Author:
    Anders Qvist
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
